briefdescription.para: Get the block size (number of weights per block) for a quant type.
Calculate total bytes needed for n_elements with given quant type.
Get the byte size per block for a quant type.
Unpack Q4_K sub-block scales and mins.

parameterdescription.para: The packed scales[12] array from block_q4_K
Output: 8 unpacked scale values (multiply by super-block d)
Output: 8 unpacked min values (multiply by super-block dmin)

briefdescription.para: Quantization block structures for weight-only quantization.

detaileddescription.para: Defines block structures for various quantization formats used in LLM inference. Primary focus on Q4_K_M which is commonly used for LLM weight compression.
Block structures are compatible with llama.cpp/GGML for model loading.
